target_sites.name: mlbprediction
target_sites.angle: Analytics, advanced stats (xBA, WAR, xFIP), data-driven

target_sites.name: bestmlbhandicapper
target_sites.angle: Sharp money, expert handicapping, situational angles

news_items.headline: Sources: Giants, Luis Arraez agree to one-year deal
news_items.description: The Giants and infielder Luis Arraez are in agreement on a one-year contract, sources told ESPN.

news_items.headline: Miguel Rojas unhappy with insurance's denial for WBC
news_items.description: A new insurance provision for this year's World Baseball Classic is preventing Dodgers INF Miguel Rojas from playing for Venezuela due to his age.

news_items.headline: Padres' Preller still eyeing moves amid club's potential sale
news_items.description: Padres GM A.J. Preller said the team's uncertain ownership situation isn't preventing the team from making moves, saying he's looking to "go round the team out and get players."

news_items.headline: Shohei Ohtani will not pitch in World Baseball Classic, Roberts says
news_items.description: Shohei Ohtani will not pitch for Samurai Japan in the upcoming World Baseball Classic, Los Angeles Dodgers manager Dave Roberts said, adding that it was Ohtani's decision.

news_items.headline: Sources: White Sox, OF Austin Hays agree on 1-year, $6M deal
news_items.description: The White Sox and free agent outfielder Austin Hays have agreed to a one-year deal, sources told ESPN.

news_items.headline: Robertson, 40, WS champion with Yankees, retires
news_items.description: Robertson, 40, WS champion with Yankees, retires
